steps.title: Collect sample data
steps.notes: Extract relevant consensus events/messages to drive dashboard design; capture notes under _report/agent/codex-3/consensus-dashboard/notes.md.

steps.title: Implement dashboard CLI
steps.notes: Add tools/consensus/dashboard.py with table/JSON output and filters (decision, assignee, status).

steps.title: Add regression tests
steps.notes: Create tests/test_consensus_dashboard.py validating parsing and formatting against fixtures.

steps.title: Document usage
steps.notes: Document the dashboard in docs/parallel-codex.md and docs/workflow.md consensus sections; store sample output under _report/agent/codex-3/consensus-dashboard/sample-output.md.

checkpoint.description: Consensus dashboard CLI with tests and docs
